attributes.title: ECORUN
attributes.description: Shoe production and transportation from Romania to Germany

attributes.address: Warehouse, London Road, Amesbury, Salisbury, Wiltshire SP4 7EN, UK
attributes.title: Warehouse in London

attributes.footprintmethodology:
if a pair of show weighs 300 g
1 g of shoe production generates 45 g carbon dioxide
attributes.description:
Manufacturing a  pair of shoes produces 13,6 kg of carbon dioxide 
if a pair of shoes weighs 300 g
1 g of shoes production generates 45 g carbon dioxide
The footprint is calculated for 2500 pair of shoes
attributes.title: ECORUN production
Warehouse in Munich to Warehouse in London
attributes.description:
Half of the shoes (1250 pairs) will be transported to London. 
One pair of shoes including box weigh app. 500 g. 
That makes total weigh 625 kg.

attributes.title: ECORUN production to Warehouse in Munich
attributes.description:
2500 pairs of shoes will be transported to Munich. 
One pair of shoes including box weigh app. 500 g. 
That makes total weigh 1250 kg.
